scripts.install:all: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm --prefix backend run build" "npm --prefix frontend run build"
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm --prefix backend run start" "npm --prefix frontend run start"
